usefulItems: cocktail glasses, fine sieve or nut milk bag, jug
title: Roses with Love

ingredients.content: 250 g fresh strawberries, chilled, washed, hulled
½ - 1 tsp rose water, to taste

preparations.content: Place strawberries and 375 g wine in mixing bowl then blend <b>15 sec/speed 7<b>.
Add remaining 375 g wine, ice cubes and rose water then mix <b>3 sec/speed 7<b>.
Strain cocktail through a fine sieve into a jug. Divide between 8 cocktail glasses and serve garnished with dried rose petals.
